Sentencas: Contaminants as particulate matter, sulfur, chlorine and tar should be removed from biosyngas to avoid damaging solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, there is no sufficient information on tar effect since they might be potentially used as a fuel, or they might cause performance losses and irreversible damages.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, this study aims to assess whether tar can be reformed inside the SOFC and used as fuel.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Short-duration experiments were conducted on Ni-GDC cells operating with simulated biosyngas containing different concentrations of representative tar compounds from biomass gasification.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While benzene and ethylbenzene could be regarded as additional fuels even at concentrations as high as 15 g/Nm(3), naphthalene and phenanthrene act as contaminants for the SOFC electro-chemical and catalytic reactions, even at concentrations of 0.3 and 0.05 g/Nm(3).
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the effect on these reactions appeared almost completely reversible.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid carbon deposited on the SOFC ceramic housing in proximity of the inlet.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Post-mortem analysis should be performed to asses the tar effect on the cell anode.
Titulo: Effect of selected representative biomass gasification tar compounds on Ni-GDC solid oxide fuel cells
